title: Max
description: A dog that helped soldiers in Afghanistan returns to the U.S. and is adopted by his handler's family after suffering a traumatic experience.

reviews.text: A fascinating and tragic what-if as a jaded art dealer discovers a troubled and extreme artist and attempts to steer him away from the path of destruction and towards the fulfillment of his artistic dreams. The art dealer is Jewish, the artist a young Adolf Hitler. One of Cusack's last interesting films and performances before he started reading the cheques rather than the scripts.
